text: <@UD4CBEH9R> I think yes... it is dependable on the country from where the api is called...

Thanks, <@UFQR010N8>.  I ask because we are getting this error: Webhook failed: Server error
Server responded with error code 500. Do you know what it means?
<@UD4CBEH9R> Where are you seeing this error? If this is in HubSpot, it means that HS is sending a workflow and the server we are attempting to reach is responding with a 500 error
Yes, <@UFBNA9K9A>. We are seeing this in HubSpot after activating a workflow

So whatever server you are attempting to reach with the webhook is failing, that’s where you need to go to fix the error.  If it’s attempting to whitelist only certain IP addresses, please don’t, it can come from basically anywhere
Are there any tools out there that help feed data into hubdb from an external API? I'd like to not spin up a server to get these details and have it run hourly --

I’ve just set up serverless API with Azure for submitting data into a leaderboard in hubdb
I used this tutorial <https://css-tricks.com/create-your-own-serverless-api/>
Here’s the js I used if that helps, I’m new to this too so someone else might be able weigh in
This is kind of the direction I was thinking I needed to go! Nice to see a tutorial out there for this
my only experience with these is using python in AWS or Google -- and that isn't easily maintable by other team members -- thanks so much <@UDJV5B73R>
<@U54TVT3C1> hey man -- looks like we get to do some serverless stuff for this!
Just looking at the tutorial now
Thanks <@UDJV5B73R>
Got it. Thank you

Salesforce <> HubSpot
ISSUE: is there a way to decrease the number of records that HubSpot tries to sync at once?
No, it tries to batch as much as it can to save on SFCD API calls
Out of curiosity, why are you looking to do this?
Thanks, Zack.  Too many SOQL queries
Gotcha, yeah you can limit the overall number of contacts coming over through the inclusion list, but not the frequency
Hey guys, need some clarification.. Can we build a popup form in husbpot landing page... Like the form will appear only if person click on the cta??
